content.detailedDescription: I served overseas in the military and worked alot around various types of aircraft. what the family and i witnessed that night was something out of this world. our 7 yr old son saw the object first and pointed it out. we stopped the car in road and watched for approx. 5 minutes until the object went from what i thought at first was a helicopter hovering to shooting off into the night sky and out of sight within 1 sec. i still can't put that any better. it was never seen again. the object was covered with several flashing lights that appeared to flash multi-colored and flashed in a circular motion around object. it was hovering just above a radio tower near the road when we approached it.
content.summary: This was a brief sighting witnessed by entire family in car.

content.detailedDescription: Returned home from getting a late night meal around 1:30am and before entering my house i decided to look at the sky given it was a crisp clear night without any real cloud formation to obstruct my view. after about 5 minutes of gazing i was starting to head in and was stopped dead in my tracks to see what i thought at first was a shooting star. as i focused in i could very clearly see that this object was not a star but rather it was 5 stars that made up the silhouette of a rather large and low flying triangle. it came into view traveling from my nw and continued towards my se. this object was traveling incredibly fast and to my astonishment, no sound!! i couldn't see any surface characteristics which made me feel as if this object was transparent. the lights that made up the triangle were exactly the same size and brightness with only 2 visible on the crafts left side and three on the right. this object seemed to be flying very low, although without any frame of references i can't really know definitively if it was either a huge craft flying high or smaller craft flying low. if my assumptions on size are correct this object was easily 100-200 feet in size. it was completely silent and i watched it travel across the sky for a total of 10/15 seconds before i lost it behind my rough.  it was nothing like i've ever seen before and i've spent many hours gazin at the sky and feel i have a very healthy dose of skepticism and this event really astounded me and further validated my belief in ufos from either us or extraterrestrials.
content.summary: Witnessed a silent,low flying object that was distinguished by 5 points of light that made up triangle. flew low and rapid.

content.detailedDescription: Daughter wife and i were carrying in grociers. we were all at van to get a load to carry in when it occured. we noticed a very very large object shoot above us then straight up in the sky. the object was very bright no noise and left a streaking tail after it had passed it occured in only a few seconds. my wife and i were dumbfounded and my daughter was very visable shaken. we decided not to tell anyone because people would laugh and think we were lying.. not sure what it was but ive never seen anything like it before hopefully i never do...
content.summary: Came over top of us then shot straight up into the sky

content.detailedDescription: Playing with child after dinner.  chased ball.  noticed a large orange/amber light in the north east sky, slowly pulsating.  called daughter over.  we watchd for 15 to 20 minutes as it hovered, then increased altitude and pushed east towards the ocean.  as it did so, the amber pulsating turned to a solid white light.  moved rapidly across the southeast coast of nc, then hovered back over land south of my position.  turned red, one light turned into two.  flickered for 1 minute or so, then disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Began as an amber color pulsating, turned to white and moved rapidly, slowed and turned red with 2 lights

content.detailedDescription: I woke up and looked straight at my backyard door which is see through and i looked up to the sky and saw the 3 lights  i thought what is that it was so close to my house can't be a plane it's a ufo i ran out my hose and went to the corner of my street to try to record it and i did ! it was flying like a normal plane but i didn't see any wings or any shape of plane or ufo i just saw 3 flashing dots in a line fly by i was like wow this is my christmas present seeing a ufo
content.summary: 3 yellow like little ball lights flying in a horizontal line it look like it was flying the dots by them selfs but in a line

content.detailedDescription: This was the same that happened on new year's eve.  i made a report on that date too.  this time was different.  my cell phone closed twice.  sometimes, i took the picture and the craft was not photographed.  other times i took the picture and the craft was in the photograph.  this time it titled.  last time it didn't. once again, it appeared to change shape.
content.summary: Ufo in the ne.  it appeared and hovered for approximately 35 minutes. it vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived at the pacific outfitters in eureka ca and saw a double rainbow.  took two consecutive photos of a rainbow.  i reviewed the photos when i got home and noticed in the first live photo that when it played something black moving very fast flew through the rainbow descending at about a 45 degree angle.  the object was not in the next photo that i can tell.
the video only plays on my iphone 6 as a live photo.  i don't know how to export it so that others can see the object move.  if you look in between the two palm trees to the right and follow the space between them up to the rainbow you will see the object streak through the rainbow.
content.summary: Upon reviewing a live photo of a rainbow, something black streaked through it blocking out the colors

content.detailedDescription:
in a car i was driving home
the bright and flashing lights
a ufo

it flashed brightly hovered down slowly

excited and shocked took a picture and showed my friends

it hovered behind a mountain
content.summary: Two lights at each end of horizontal line

content.detailedDescription: Driving home, south on u.S. route 42 in florence ky near union ky, around 11 p.M.  pretty well lit commercial area.  sky slightly overcast.  glanced out my driver's side window at the sky while at a traffic light.  observed three orange-red lights in a more-or-less vertical orientation (and not in a perfectly straight line). i first rationalized it had to be a plane or planes (this area is in a direct flight path for incoming planes to nearby cvg airport), but have lived in this area long enough to know what plane beacon lights look like in the night sky.  lights were all same solid color, no noticeable pulsing, shimmering, color changes, or movement.  after traffic light changed, i continued to glance at the objects frequently for about 1/4 mile and then pulled into a medical building parking lot to try to continue observing them.  however, after parking my car and looking back at the lights, i could only see one light.  waited about half a minute, it became harder to see or perhaps it "disappeared." i then continued home.  i felt calm yet intrigued by this sighting.
content.summary: 3 orange-red spheres in vertical orientation southeast of route 42 near union ky

content.detailedDescription:
It was new years eve 2015.  it was around 11:45 p.M.  i was in my master bedroom talking with my wife and 3 year old daughter getting ready to shout happy new year.  we have a large picture window looking out in to the back yard.  our yard is maybe 15ft wide then there is a brick retaining wall that is 5 ft high and on top of that we built a 6 ft wood fence for privacy from the neighbors.  behind this fence are two houses standing side by side.
  sporadically through the night there were numerous fireworks going off.  so out of the corner of my eye i see this super bright glow and i turn all the way around and the glow is slowly but steadily gliding over the top of my neighbors roof.  i instantly thought it was maybe a firework but as i looked at it, it wasn't falling or going skyward and there were no sparks or fire trail or noise that i could hear.  
  i yelled "what the hell is that?!" and i ran all the way across the house to the front door with my phone in hand trying to get to the video recording option while i was running down the hallway.  for some reason in the back of my mind, i knew it wasn't anything i had ever seen....I almost thought it was a toilet paper roll on fire just because of the size and the intense light coming from it.  it was brighter than any light i had ever seen.  it's twice as bright as the street light in the video.  i was trying to hear a noise come from it like a drone sounds like but there wasn't any.  there weren't any flames coming from it, it just had the illusion of being on fire.  i honestly don't know how else to describe it.
  i don't neccessarily believe in ufo's but this has changed my mind a little.  it kinda freaked me out honestly.  i couldn't hardly go to sleep that night. then as i watched the video to make sure i really got it recorded, i noticed there is something else in the video.  is it my phone acting weird?  i don't know, its never done that and i have taken thousands of videos. 
  it looks like a mini flying object.  it wasnt a bug because we don't have anything like that here and especially in the middle of winter.  it definitely seemed interested in the orb.  i don't know.  
  i just have a gut feeling that this was as real as it gets.
content.summary: Saw a burning ball of light fly slowly over my neighbors roof top.

content.detailedDescription:
On january 4th, i returned home from work at approximately 5:45pm.  it was dark.  i and my 12 year old grandson were taking trash out to deposit in the trash bins that had been placed at the front curb.  clouds of an approaching weather front were slowly moving from the southwest toward the northeast.  in a break in the clouds i saw a yellow-orange light.  it was bigger than a star and slightly bigger than planets seen in the area.  i couldn't tell if it was moving slowly or if it was stationary and looked like it was moving due to the motion of the clouds.  i put my finger up and pointed to it to gauge movement.  it appeared to be moving slowly toward the north-to-northeast.  then it dropped what appeared to be molten orange material that was almost the same size as the light itself. at first i thought maybe it was dropping flares, but they did not fall far from the main light before disintegrating into smaller pieces or distinquishing.  it dimmed and appeared to diminish in size as it dropped the "molten" material.  several times it appeared to dim and go out, but then would get slightly brighter again, but never getting as bright or as large as originally seen.  it slowly veered east-to-northeast and disappeared behind a small mountain behind our house.
it was difficult to estimate the altitude but it appeared to be within the cloud layer or beyond.  the total time of the sighting i would guess to be about 2 minutes.  when it disappeared, i looked at my watch and it was exactly 5:59pm.
my grandson was by my side and we have not discussed it since nor have i allowed him to see this report in case anyone wants to talk to us separately.
we have many planes flying over our house during the day and during the night.  this did not resemble a plane or star or planet.  i spent 9 years working on navy fighter jets and i have never witnessed anything like this before.
content.summary: Moving orange light with molten mat'l dropping short distance that did not resemble flares.  object flickered and dimmed after "melting"

content.detailedDescription:
In jan 2014 i first observed what i thought was the planet mars from my house in the mountain pine ridge area of cayo district, belize in the sse sky at about a 15 deg elevation. then i spotted mars. the orb was somewhat larger than observable planets, was white, brighter than sirius or saturn, and instead of shimmering like planets, flashed intermittently the colors red and blue, with red predominantly at the top and blue beneath. the orb would remain stationary and for about 10 % of the time would move erratically, unlike any known aerospace vehicle. in the first sighting, it fluttered downward like a leaf, then upward and to the right, held its position for another few minutes, then repeated the fluttering, held, then faded out.

since that sighting, more frequent observation of the sky has been made and up to three of these orbs have been spotted at the same time, in positions s, sse, and e, at elevations varying from 15 to 45 deg above the horizon. as of the fourth quarter of 2015, every time i have looked for them, i observed them. they are commonplace. neighbors have confirmed my sightings and several other people have observed them with me and noticed their movements. 

i first thought that saccadic eye movements might account for the motion, but by obscuring the orb with a stationary object, they would move out from behind it.

these orbs have no surface details other than the flashing colors. they appear to be miles away, the central one being at least over or beyond belmopan, about 20 miles away from where i observe, and in its direction. they move within certain soft bounds, remaining in roughly the same position in the sky, on average. total range of motion in both dimensions is about + and - 3 deg.

i live on a jungle hilltop where any artifacts in the sky such as airplanes are infrequent.

the regularity - almost predictability - of the occurrence of these orbs leads me to suggest that others in the region observe the night sky for them too.
content.summary: One to 3 flashing red-blue-white circles larger than a planet that are stationary, then move erratically, and have been observed at nights for the last two years.

content.detailedDescription:
I was attempting to photograph an eagle in the trees at the back of our lake property. the bird flew off high and to the south. it was a quiet cool morning, about 44 degrees and there were only a very few high thin cirrus clouds visible. i focused on trying to get pictures of the bird. there was what appeared to be a star in that direction but i hardly noticed it. it was when i zoomed in on the images to view the bird in greater detail i saw this object. it appeared round with 6 bright lights on it evenly spaced. one image showed 4 lights, one showed 5 and on showed 6; then it disappeared. i wasn't sure what the object was, but it was not a drone (altitude was too high.) it was not any type of helicopter or other conventional aircraft. i grew up on military bases and this was nothing conventional. i must admit when i zoomed in on the object is found it pretty exciting. note: i did not zoom in so much as to cause pixelation. you can see the large bird is in focus. the object simply disappeared. i would love to see it again. catching this on camera (camera phone) was purely accidental. i hope you can offer some insight into what this was.  thank you.
note: i am 62 years old and have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Was photographing a large bird and object was discovered in pictures.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We live in an area of greene co. tn facing viking mountain. on several occasions now we have seen a very bright light over the mountain at night. at first we thought it was a vehicles headlights on the mountain however due to the rapid movement we have decided it would not be possible for a vehicle to travel that rapidly on the winding mountain roads. the light is very bright and a very large round shape. it very quickly shoots up, down, left, and right with no set direction. the movement is very rapid and raises above the mountain top and below the treeline. from our location we cannot get a clear picture or a clean sight with binoculars, it just appears to be a very bright light. typically when we see the light it lasts for a couple hours. also, when we see the light we typically zee one to three aircraft flying in the area around the light. it is clear these are typical aircraft with standard flashing lights and not part of the mountain light however the comparison is size and brightness is astonishing. we have read reports of similar lights in the same area spanning over the past 7 years. very odd, and very unnatural.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light moving very rapidly, up, down, left, right over viking mountain. seen many times at night.

content.detailedDescription:
This event took place on january 4, 2016.  the time was 2:45 pm.  sky was cloudless, bright blue sky and very cold (-10c).  the wind was blowing in a westerly direction.  event took place in oshawa, ontario, canada.  

i was driving home from work on the 401 (major east/west freeway in ontario).  i got off the 401 at the bloor/harmony exit and proceeded north on harmony road (i have driven this route home for the last 12 years).  harmony road is a four lane road (two lanes northbound and two lanes southbound) at this point and there are residential homes on both sides of the street.  the traffic was heavy as is normal this time of the day.  as i approached the intersection of harmony road and olive street i came to a red light and stopped.  i was the first car in the right lane at the intersection.  as i was stopped my eye caught something bright at the top of my windshield and i looked up at it.  what i saw next was very puzzling.  as i'm not sure of the exact size of the two objects i can only tell you what it "seemed" like to me.  to me the objects appeared to be about 6 feet long and about 3 feet wide.  the best idea of a shape that i can give you is they looked like box kites.  they were both very, very shiny.  almost like a bright chrome reflecting the sun.  however only parts of the objects were reflecting the sun, other parts were translucent and you could see the the sky through the material.  to me it seemed like these objects were about 200 feet high, maybe 200-300 feet away from me.  generally they looked as if they were hovering above the intersection.  the object that was closer to me was about 10 feet lower than the second object and they were about 10-15 feet apart.  i was watching them for between 1-2 minutes.  i have my cell phone with me and wanted to get out of my car, but as there was a lot of traffic behind me i didn't want to hold them up (i really regret now that i didn't take pictures). when the light turned green i made a right turn (so i was now driving eastbound on olive street and the objects were now behind me and i was driving away from them).  i just couldn't believe what i had just been looking at.  olive street at this point is a two lane road with residential homes on either side of the street.  as i was driving east on olive street i just had a "feeling" that i should look up into the sky.  when i did this i was shocked to see another ufo that was completely different  than the first two that i had just witnessed.  at this point i'm driving so i can't look for long periods of time at this third object.  again, it's difficult to estimate the distance, but i would have to say that it appeared to be anywhere from 5,000 to 10,000 feet up.  it was circular and white, with a dark blue line that appeared as a circle inward from the outside rim.  there were four objects that look something like mechanical arms or large rods that were jutting out from the object (if the circle had corners there would have been one of these rods at each corner).  i have a sunroof that has an inside cloth cover.  at this point i pulled the cover back and looked directly up at the bottom of the object (still at the same height).  to me it seemed as if the object was not moving.  olive street ends at townline road and i had made up my mind to stop at this intersection to see if i could get a picture of this object.  when i got to the intersection ( about 20 seconds since i had first seen this third object) i stopped the car and looked up and the object was gone.  

when i got home i told my wife about my experience and i then called the durham regional police.  the woman who was on the phone i told her a little of what i had witnessed, but had really phoned to see if anyone else had called in.  she said there were no other reports.  she then patched me through to the oshawa airport which is a small airport about 10 minute drive from where i witnessed the objects.  the man at the airport said they had no strange aircraft flying around, but took my name and number and told me he would call me back if anyone else called in.  he did tell me that he has had several calls about ufos over the last several months.

i really, really regret not taking any photos.  i have to mention that i'm very familiar with all kinds of aircraft in the sky.  as i mentioned i live near a small airport and have seen lots and lots of aircraft flying in daylight and at nighttime.  also our area has a police helicopter and have viewed that flying around many, many times.  while this object was similar to a box kite, it was like no box kite i have ever seen before.  the area where i witnessed the objects is about 4 miles from lake ontario.  this really freaked me out as i have no idea what i was looking at.
content.summary: I saw two box kite like ufos that were very reflective and also transparent.

content.detailedDescription: I was playing the piano on the bottom floor of the house next to an exit access. this black cloth was floating back and forth outside the window. it was night.I had no interest in checking it out. our house was in the mountains 20 miles from the beach in malibu on 68 acres of land. i got up with a blank thoughtless mind. i was drawn to open the door. the first thing that caught my attention was my chest on the left was sucking in and out and the noise was a shhh shhh with every pulse movement. five feet before me was a very plain 14 foot rocket ship with thick vapor under and around it. i knew it was silently hoovering because there were stairs in the front part of the ship where as the back end of the rocket was close to the side of the house. it had a more squarish tinted window on the side front and i could see red, green and yellow lights below the dash. the rocket had no seams or door entry. pryor to that night, for several months i would sit on a trampoline on a large third floor deck begging aliens to come visit me for hours. the first night i wasn't on the trampoline i was on the bottom floor playing the piano when the sighting happened. at the back of the vehicle was a large dark grey robot. it had a round helmet with a brown tinted shield across the front. it had solid long legs with small red lights intermittently flashing on and off. i was in disbelief and more lucid than freaked out. then an invisible entity to the right of me asked clearly close to my right ear in a robot accent, "are you ready for this?" there was no way that robot could fit in the rocket, it was my size. then i got panicked. i thought do they think i know what "this" means? i answered back in a robot accent, "no i am not!" there were people working upstairs in our recording studio. they were on a break and i excitedly told these twins and one of the twins husband, "hurry! hurry! there's a spaceship outside!!!" all of us ran down the stairs. i opened the door and it was still there and my chest did the same thing and i pointed it out to the husband. the girls walked right up to it and both said, "we don't see anything." who ever they are can change form, make themselves invisible and know where you are in your house. i don't go out after dark alone. my doctor had to prescribe zanax for me to take when it starts getting dark. this event has been instrumental in me having dozens of hard core anxiety attacks after dark. i haven't had one in a while surprisingly. i suppose the ship and robot didn't fly away but vanished. i'm afraid they may have kept an eye on me in my home over the years. they did that night. why me? the only person in all mankind they want me because something about me fits their criteria. i was 35 and now i'm 62 and for 27 years i wanted answers and find similar stories. i have no photographs but i have located the husband wesley j. smith who saw and heard my chest action. i e-mailed him today and haven't gotten a response yet. they still live in california. the twins were just a witness to me swearing it was still there. why could only i see it? i hope my information is helpful and something unknown.
content.summary: I was sitting at a piano and through the window a black cloth flew across. i opened the door and 5 ft. from me was a rocket ship and a robot. in my right ear i was asked, "are you ready for this" i answered, "no i'm not."

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my apartment by the pool.  the orbs of light shown through a lite overcast. the lights moved in perfect geometric mandela pattern. such a wondrous performance.
content.summary: Orbs in unison moving in a perfect geometric pattern outward in all directions to horizon and converging simultaneously to center.  very cool.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother in back yard brother said you see that no i replied something inside me almost told me to shine my very powerful flashlight i flashed three times instantinstantaneously on the third flash the object shined the brightest light i have ever seen it hit me on left arm and heart area hit my brothers left arm but not heart area then it took off it began as an orange yellowish orb.I've seen hundreds of meteors this object was absolutely faster than anything i've seen at least 3_4 times faster than any meteor i have ever seen.Tthe orb changed it became smaller and turned into what looked like a horizontal dimond streched out then before it died out gave off brightest white light i have ever seen then noticed a trail of what looked like some kind of dust and it went in the direction of selfridge air national base just after i grabbed my older brother by the shirt afraid and asked him what just happened to us.We both were wondering if something that fast should make noise but dident i have thought about it every day since
content.summary: Brother hay whats that got hunting flashlight flashed 3 times it seen me and brother shined  both of us took off fastest object ever seen

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv at about 8-30pm and noticed a bright white light coming towards the house at about 400 to 500 feet, the object passed slowly over the house but made no sound , just a swishing sort of noise, my windows were open. i thought it strange that i could not hear an engine, as it was low and
passed right overhead, i rushed to the back window and saw it do a u-turn and come back over the house, this time i saw a row of about 10 blue lights underneath , the object was dark and i could not make out any features but it seemed to be quite long , the object carried on in the direction it came from, staying at the same height and speed, i watched it until it went out of sight, i am sure that others would have seen it. it certainly wasn't a plane or helicopter, i am now starting to believe in ufo;s  and keep a camera handy in case of another sighting.
content.summary: Bright white light approaching , turned and displayed row of blue lights

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were driving back from sedona towards tempe and while we were stuck in traffic we both saw this blue white orb of light flash through the sky for maybe 15-30 seconds before it completely disappeared. it was like nothing we had ever seen before.
content.summary: White blue orb of light

content.detailedDescription: In the morning around 7.40am my friend was driving back home from a disco in k.L city.When i past a cemetery near my resident area,i realize there was a bright light at the sky beside the morning sun,but it was small bright light so i was asking my friend wether did he saw what i saw in the sky.Then he pull over the car and we both looked at object and wondering what could it be.It cannot be an airplane because ite not moving at all.It look like an egg shape but in silver surface and it obvious to the eyes because of the reflect of the sunlight.While looking at the object around 2-3minutes,it begin to moved slowly to the east and at some point it moved so faat like a bullet and it was gone from the eye sight.
content.summary: Its a silver egg at the morning clear sky

content.detailedDescription: I was with my cousin heading east on the i10 on the 2nd of january, 2016. we were on our way to a street located in northeast scottsdale called rio verde. i have been wanting to take a drive on that particular road because of it's lack of light posts. as we approached the i17 loop going north to flagstaff, i saw several oddly shaped lights hovering above downtown. initially, i dismissed then as being commercial aircraft but the longer i stared, the more i noticed the weird shape and color of the flying objects. they had the color of a burning flame: bright yellow,orange, and red. it seemed as if someone had painted several small streaks of colors onto the night sky. i caught a very short glimpse as i was driving away from the lights so i was unable to record them, i asked my cousin to take photo or a video of them but it was too late as we were facing north and the lights were out of our view/reach. the lights just seemed to hover and maybe move slightly but for the most part were stationary, the brief moment i saw them. the moment i realized what i was witnessing, i began to feel excited for the phenomena i had encountered but i am saddened that i was unable to capture evidence of the objects. i attempted to find other testimonies such as myself via facebook but i didn't get as many as i had hoped. only another person besides myself and my cousin came forth validating what we had seen and she claimed they appeared and disappeared rather quickly.
content.summary: I was driving with my cousin going north on the i17 loop and we spotted maybe 5 ufos over downtown phoenix.

content.detailedDescription:
Attached is a digital photo which appears to have captured something in the background that you may be able to identify.

1. i was riding with friends above estes park, colorado. we had stopped to take pictures.

2. i first noticed - at the time of download while viewing the digital pictures. i did not notice any event in real-time.

3. my thoughts were curiosity in what appears in the photo. other photos taken with the same camera/same time do not have this. i am inclined to think that the camera lens was clean.

4. only noticed on photo

5. curious

6. n/a
content.summary: Did not notice any event. only noticed the anomaly in the attached digital pic that appears curious, perhaps captured during the camera shutter click. not sure what it is.

content.detailedDescription:
voici les photos que j'ai prise le vendredi 4 dã©cembre sur un sentier de rendonnã©e de ma region. je marche ce sentier depuis plus de 10 ans, plusieur fois par semaine et n'avais j'amais rencontrã© de telles traces.

 les 2 premiã¨res photos son du meme individu et les photo 3-4 un autres. la photo 5 est une prise le lendemain alors que j'y suis retournã© pour les mesurer. la premiã¨re fesais plus de 20 pouces et la seconde prã¨s de 17 pouce. mes bottes, ont 12 pouces de longueur.

 le samedi 5 dã©cembre lorsque j'y suis retournã© pour prendre les photos, j'ai dã©couvert beaucoup d'autre traces que j'ai suivi sur une centaine de metres.

 le 18 dã©cembre, j'ai trouvã© une autre trace sur le meme sentier. je n'avais malheureusement pas mon cellulaire et l'appareil photo que j'avais avec moi n'avais pas assã©e de charge.

 vous pouvez me contacter par e-mail ou telephone si vous dã©sirez plus de detail ou photos.

 quelques une de ces photos ont ã©tã© partagã© sur le web sur des forums, je ne puis donc pas vous en donner l'exclusivitã©. ce sont des forums ou des ã©venements que l'on juge paranormal et autres sont discutã©s. 

 p.S. photo prise avec mon i-phone 6.
content.summary: Sasquatch

content.detailedDescription: One photo of just the lights and one of lights and clear triangle.
content.summary: Was taking photos of the snowfall and after noticed ufo in photo,  clear photo of triangle,  two out of 4-5photos have object in them

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work on 03/nov/2015 around 06:45h. am and the camera in the car recorded these images.
i didn`t see this with my eyes, i only saw it after a few days when i was visualising and deleting the files of the week in the camera.
 the full original video has 1gb so i edited the original file just to cut the moment of the strange ligt with some kind of beam acting like a scan
content.summary: I was driving to work and the camera in the car caught these images

content.detailedDescription: Not a flying event. nasa image analysed and found there were 3 objects on the surface of mars. please have a look.
content.summary: Not a flying event. nasa image analysed and found there were 3 objects on the surface of mars. please have a look.

content.detailedDescription: Eu estava em uma rodovia com meu pai,minha mã£e e meu irmã£o.Quando vi o objeto chamei minha famã­lia mas minha mã£e e meu irmã£o estavam dormindo e meu pai estava dirigindo.Quando vi o ovni achei que eram holofotes mas estava pairando sobre o carro.O objeto era um cã­rculo com umas 6 luzes que piscavam em sentido horã¡rio.Eu me mantive calmo mas me senti estranho quando o objeto desapareceu eu me senti como se tivesse acordado de um sonho.O objeto desapareceu porque saiu do meu ã¢ngulo de visã£o,tornei a procura-lo mas nã£o o achei.
content.summary: Eu estava numa rodovia quando vi o objeto pairando co luzes giratorias que seguiam-me

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on i-79 about 8:30pm traveling to pittsburgh. i was a little past meadville, pa. i had a funny feeling, as i had before in other sightings, and looked out my window and to the sky. there was a huge flash of light seen by myself and other drivers that appeared and traveled southwest very fast, then stopped and disappeared. i posted my experience on facebook and asked if anyone else had seen the "fireball" in the sky, and a friend of mine shared that he was traveling northbound toward erie, pa at the same time and confirmed he had seen the same thing!
content.summary: Observed an object on the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My cellphone had fast burst camera app installed. 
i pressed the shutter just a few seconds and took a total of 36 photos,
the first 5 photos showed a black object moving at an incredible speed!!
i also convert the photos to a video file.
no naked eyes contact...
content.summary: A black object moving fast!
